name: Magical Date: Doki Doki Kokuhaku Daisakusen
overview: Magical Date is the Playstation conversion of the Arcade Machine by Taito. The theme of the game is that you date girls and to make a more successful date you got to win some mini games. If you do it well you unlock photos to watch them on the gallery mode. There are 3 characters to choose from: -Ayumi Ichijouji -Rin Midorikawa -Kasumi Huyuno The game got three modes: - Arcade: some kind of board that show the date progress and in witch the player should pass some mini games until arriving a place where he can take pictures of the girl. - Dance mode: You watch the 3 girls of the game dancing. - Photo Studio: Select the girl that you prefer and take her pictures in different places that can be seen later in the Album mode. - Album mode: Watch the pictures that you take in Photo Studio or playing the Arcade mode.
